We Represent Victims Injured By Defective Drugs Or Medical Devices

Doctors rely on over-the-counter drugs, prescription medication and medical devices to treat almost every ailment. It is critical that the drugs and devices doctors choose to use perform as expected.

When those drugs and devices fail to perform appropriately, serious injury and fatalities are possible.

Common Drugs With Dangerous Side Effects

Defective drugs that have received attention lately include:

  • Wellbutrin
  • Accutane
  • Celebrex
  • Crestor
  • Fosamax
  • Levaquin
  • Lexapro
  • Paxil
  • Effexor
  • Fen-Phen
  • Fentanyl
  • Fluoxetine
  • Topamax

Defective medical devices include:

  • Transvaginal mesh
  • Knee implants
  • Pain pumps
  • Stents

If you or a loved one has been injured by a defective drug or medical device, the best step you can take is to secure skilled and experienced legal representation as soon as possible.

50 Years Of Experience Helping Columbus Residents Recover Compensation For Their Injuries

At Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC, we are skilled litigators who understand what it takes to build a winning case for our clients.

We know the impact that injuries from defective drugs and medical devices can have on people’s lives. The effects can remain with people for years and possibly for the rest of their lives. With more than 100 years of combined experience, our attorneys have the skill and knowledge to truly help those who have been injured by defective drugs and medical devices.

Contact Our Personal Injury Firm Today

We invite you to reach out to our Columbus, Ohio, law firm to learn more about your legal options. With our team of lawyers, you can trust that we have the skill, experience and resources to give you the best chance of securing the full compensation you deserve.

Call 614-360-2706 today or simply contact us online. We collect attorneys’ fees only if we recover compensation for you.
